posts.title: Market Roundup: Sensex slips by 314 points, Nifty ends at 17,898; today's top winners and losers
posts.desc: The top gainers of BSE Sensex were Maruti, Asian Paints, Power Grid, NTPC and ITC. The top losers were Axis Bank. Reliance, Kotak Bank, Bharti Airtel and Titan

posts.title: Go Fashion IPO opens today at price band of Rs 655 to Rs 690; here's everything you need to know
posts.desc: Promoters and shareholders such as VKS Family Trust and PKS Family Trust will offload 7.45 lakh shares each

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of gold sold at Rs 49,360, silver trades at Rs 66,800 per kg
posts.desc: In Delhi, 10 grams of 22-carat gold is being sold at Rs 48,300. While for the same quantity in Mumbai, the same is being traded at Rs 48,360.

posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Rates constant on 17 November, check here what you need to pay in your city
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 17 November 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 103.97 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Fitch retains India's sovereign rating, says risks to medium-term growth 'narrowing'
posts.desc: Mobility indicators have returned to pre-pandemic levels and high-frequency indicators point to strength in the manufacturing sector, it said

posts.title: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala-backed Akasa Air inks $9 billion order with Boeing for 72 jets
posts.desc: Akasa was co-founded by Jhunjhunwala and former Jet Airways CEO Vinay Dube. Former Indigo president Aditya Ghosh is also on board of the airline

posts.title: Economic recovery taking hold, private investment should resume, says Shaktikanta Das
posts.desc: Lauding tech entrepreneurs, the RBI governor said the country has emerged as a top performer in the startup landscape, attracting billions of foreign capital

posts.title: Market Roundup : Sensex falls by 396 points, Nifty ends at 17,999; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: The top gainers were Maruti, Mahindra & Mahindra, Tech Mahindra, L&T, Bajaj Finance. The top losers were Reliance, SBI, UltraTech Cement, NTPC and IndusInd Bank

posts.title: ​Lalit Goyal arrested by ED: What you need to know about the businessman and charges against him
posts.desc: Lalit Goyal was arrested after the Enforcement Directorate put out a look out circular against him

posts.title: Rupee slips 7 paise to 74.53 against US dollar in early trade
posts.desc: The dollar index rose by 0.02 percent to 95.42, global oil benchmark Brent crude futures advanced 0.78 percent to USD 82.69 per barrel

posts.title: Cryptocurrency update: Bitcoin, Ether and other cryptos decline in value, while Tether witnesses rise
posts.desc: The global crypto market cap also saw a fall of 7.10 percent over the last 24 hours and is currently at $2.66 trillion.

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of gold at Rs 48,920; silver trading at Rs 66,600 per kg
posts.desc: The Multi Commodity Exchange data reveals that gold futures price rose to Rs 49,350.00, with a rise of 0.11 percent while silver’s futures too witnessed a gain of 0.49 percent, rising to Rs 66,890.00

posts.title: Sigachi Industries IPO listing: Shares of cellulose-based manufacturer open on BSE at 250 percent premium
posts.desc: As per the initial public offering (IPO) of the company, the Rs 125.43 crore was subscribed 101.91 times in the price band of Rs 161 to Rs 163

posts.title: Rupee surges 12 paise to 74.33 against US dollar in early trade
posts.desc: The dollar index fell 0.12 percent to 95.01 and global oil benchmark Brent crude futures fell 0.82 percent to USD 81.50 per barrel

posts.title: Tarsons Products IPO opens today at price band of Rs 635-662 per share; here's everything you need to know
posts.desc: Promoters Sanjive Sehgal and Rohan Sehgal will offload up to 3.9 lakh and 3.1 lakh equity shares respectively, as part of the OFS. Furthermore, according to Economic Times, up to 1.25 crore equity shares will be divested by investor Clear Vision Investment Holdings Pte Ltd

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of yellow metal at Rs 49,290; silver trades at Rs 67,200 per kg
posts.desc: The gold futures prices fell to Rs 49,214.00, declining by 0.26 percent, as per Multi Commodity Exchange data. As for silver, the futures incurred a loss of 0.87 percent, falling to Rs 66,562

posts.title: Stablecoins: Cryptocurrencies threaten the financial system but no one is getting to grips with them
posts.desc: Stablecoins enable investors to keep money in their digital wallets that is less volatile than bitcoin, giving them one less reason to need a bank account
